content: As an AI language model, I am not equipped to provide financial or investment advice, and ultimately the decision of whether to buy a house in Arcadia or a neighboring city depends on your personal needs and circumstances. That being said, Arcadia can be a desirable place to live, with its well-regarded schools, varied dining and shopping options, and proximity to popular destinations like the Santa Anita Park racetrack and the Los Angeles Arboretum. However, the higher housing prices in Arcadia mean that it may not be feasible for everyone, so it's important to consider your budget and priorities when making a decision.
